issue.message: Duplicate id `@+id/umeng_xp_banner_bg`, already defined earlier in this layout
issue.summary: Duplicate ids within a single layout
issue.explanation: Within a layout, id's should be unique since otherwise `findViewById()` can return an unexpected view.
